title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Upon opening the Help view, it is necessary to first click on one of the interactive areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the navigation frame, or the content frame) before the keyboard navigation starts working.
OB: Upon opening the Help view, keyboard navigation does not work immediately. The user needs to click on one of the interactive areas for it to start functioning.
EB: The Help view should start in a state where keyboard navigation is immediately functional.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate using the keyboard without clicking on any interactive area.
3. Observe that keyboard navigation does not work.
4. Click on one of the interactive areas (banner with tool buttons, navigation frame, content frame).
5. Observe that keyboard navigation starts functioning properly after clicking on an interactive area.
